dmca.title: N/A
dmca.body:
Dear Sir
I recently saw your articles on the Internet entitled, "More Fast Food Tips - Eat Smart, Eat Health Dieting Advice!," "Healthy Lunches on the Go," "Quick Breakfast and Dinner Choices at Home," and "You Can Eat on the Go Without Getting Fat!." I was concerned to see your use of the phrase "THE FAST FOOD DIET" because I own trademark rights in this phrase in the field of diet and nutrition. Accordingly, I would appreciate it if you would either choose a different title for your article in the future or indicate my ownership of trademark rights in the phrase.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Jim Punkre
President

cc: Anthony V. Lupo, Esq.
Halle Markus
